name: Player
description: Players are Entities that represents the individual behind the mouse and keyboard. Players are spawned automatically when connected to the server.

functions.name: Ban
functions.description: Bans the player from the server

functions.name: Connect
functions.description: Redirects the player to another server

functions.name: Kick
functions.description: Kicks the player from the server

functions.name: Possess
functions.description: Makes a Player to possess and control a Character

functions.name: StartCameraFade
functions.description: Does a camera fade to/from a solid color
functions.description_long: Does a camera fade to/from a solid color. Animates automatically

parameters.name: from_alpha
parameters.description: Alpha at which to begin the fade. Range [0..1], where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque solid color.

parameters.name: to_alpha
parameters.description: Alpha at which to finish the fade.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: How long the fade should take, in seconds.

parameters.name: should_fade_audio
parameters.description: True to fade audio volume along with the alpha of the solid color.

parameters.name: hold_when_finished
parameters.description: True for fade to hold at the ToAlpha until explicitly stopped (e.g. with StopCameraFade)

functions.name: SetManualCameraFade
functions.description: Turns on camera fading at the given opacity
functions.description_long: Turns on camera fading at the given opacity. Does not auto-animate, allowing user to animate themselves. Call StopCameraFade to turn fading back off.

parameters.name: in_fade_amount
parameters.description: Range [0..1], where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque solid color.

functions.name: StopCameraFade
functions.description: Stops camera fading.

functions.name: SetCameraLocation
functions.description: Sets the Player's Camera Location (only works if not possessing any Character)

functions.name: SetCameraRotation
functions.description: Sets the Player's Camera Rotation

functions.name: TranslateCameraTo
functions.description: Smoothly moves the Player's Camera Location (only works if not possessing any Character)

parameters.name: exp
parameters.description: Exponential used to smooth interp, use 0 for linear movement

functions.name: RotateCameraTo
functions.description: Smoothly moves the Player's Camera Rotation

parameters.name: exp
parameters.description: Exponential used to smooth interp, use 0 for linear movement

functions.name: SetCameraSocketOffset
functions.description: Sets the Player's Camera Socket Offset (Spring Arm Offset)

functions.name: SetCameraArmLength
functions.description: Sets the Player's Camera Arm Length (Spring Arm length)

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Whether to bypass interpolation and set the target to its value directly

functions.name: SetCameraFOV
functions.description: Sets the Player's Camera FOV (if not possessing a Character)

parameters.name: fov
parameters.description: Value must be between 5 and 170. Pass empty to reset to default.

functions.name: SetCameraSpeedSettings
functions.description: Sets the Player's Camera Speed Settings (if not possessing a Character)

parameters.name: acceleration
parameters.description: Acceleration applied by input (rate of change of velocity)

parameters.name: deceleration
parameters.description: Deceleration applied when there is no input (rate of change of velocity)

parameters.name: turning_boost
parameters.description: Setting affecting extra force applied when changing direction, making turns have less drift and become more responsive. Velocity magnitude is not allowed to increase, that only happens due to normal acceleration. It may decrease with large direction changes. Larger values apply extra force to reach the target direction more quickly, while a zero value disables any extra turn force.

functions.name: AttachCameraTo
functions.description: Attaches the Player`s Camera to an Actor

functions.name: ResetCamera
functions.description: Resets the Camera to default state (Unspectate and Detaches)

functions.name: Spectate
functions.description: Spectates other Player

functions.name: SetName
functions.description: Sets the player's name

functions.name: SetVOIPChannel
functions.description: Sets the VOIP Channel of this Player (will only communicate with other players in the same channel)

functions.name: SetVOIPSetting
functions.description: Sets the VOIP Settings of this Player

functions.name: SetVOIPVolume
functions.description: Sets the VOIP Volume of this Player

functions.name: UnPossess
functions.description: Release the Player from the Character

functions.name: GetAccountIconURL
functions.description: Return a URL which can be used through WebUI and Widgets to display the Player's Steam Avatar (64x64)

parameters.name: return_base
parameters.description: Whether to return the current (false) or base (true) value. The base is the same value set by SetCameraArmLength().

functions.name: GetDimension
functions.description: Gets this Player's dimension

functions.name: SetDimension
functions.description: Sets this Player's dimension

events.name: DimensionChange
events.description: Triggered when a Player changes it's dimension

events.name: Possess
events.description: Trigerred when Player starts controlling a Character

events.name: Ready
events.description: Triggered when Player is ready (the client fully joined, loaded the map and all entities and is ready to play)

events.name: UnPossess
events.description: A Character was released from the Player

events.name: VOIP
events.description: When a Player starts/ends using VOIP

return.description: When 'is_talking' is true, return false to prevent this voice stream from playing (on server will prevent for everyone, on client will prevent only for the client)
